verbose_text: To confirm that late anti-MHC class I indirect-pathway CD4T cell responses were due to recognition of MHC class I alloantigen on graft parenchyma, bm12.Kd.IE bone marrow chimeric mice were created in which H-2K d expression was restricted to the hematopoietic lineage, whereas the graft parenchyma expressed the I-A bm12 and I-E alloantigens (XREF_FIG B).
